Reviews.Title: “No frills place to stay in Sultanahmet with helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: fyzhix
Reviews.Content: wife stayed week aprilmay 2009 stayed worst hotels stayed hotels restaurant hidden gem hotel view bosphorus food especially breakfast server pride profession serve paid internet onsite youre numerous internet cafes unreliable slow rated cleanliness poor entire hotel thorough cleaning beds comfortable clean probably stayed dont expect spending time youre sleeping bathroom clean lots hot water pressure sirkeci train station youre walking distance major sites sultanahmet tram stop corner boxes front desk safes youre looking budget emphasis budget hotel comfortable clean beds recommend

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: Ultrarun
Reviews.Content: booking confirmed half available arrived shipped half nearby hotels scary dumps example hall light hall size christmas tree light feel keyhole trash drinking glasses bathroom smelled sewage sheet bed bed blood stains mattress hotels istanbul tonight ive moved hotel ada wonderful reasonable price quieter closer major sights stay instead
